author: Brian Turner
method: Place all of the ingredients except the grated coconut into a pan and bring to a simmer. Cook for 10-12 minutes, or until the rice is tender, adding more water as necessary.  Just before serving, stir in the grated coconut and serve in a bowl with a drizzle of cream.
